restaurants.name: Spice Route
restaurants.about: Spice Route offers a delightful journey through North Indian cuisine, blending traditional flavors with a modern twist.

restaurants.name: Tandoori Nights
restaurants.offers: Free dessert on orders over Rs. 500
restaurants.about: Tandoori Nights is renowned for its authentic tandoori dishes, offering a vibrant dining experience in the heart of Mumbai.

restaurants.name: Punjabi Tadka
restaurants.about: Punjabi Tadka offers an authentic taste of Punjab with its flavorful chole bhature and other Punjabi delicacies.

restaurants.name: Amritsari Delights
restaurants.offers: Happy Hour: 2:00 PM - 4:00 PM, Buy 1 Get 1 Free
restaurants.about: Amritsari Delights brings the taste of Amritsar to your plate, specializing in robust flavors of North Indian cuisine.

restaurants.name: Royal Rasoi
restaurants.about: Royal Rasoi offers a royal dining experience with a wide array of vegetarian and non-vegetarian dishes from across India.

restaurants.name: Delhi Darbar
restaurants.about: Delhi Darbar is a landmark in Delhi known for its traditional Indian breakfast and hearty North Indian meals throughout the day.

restaurants.name: Lucknowi Bawarchi
restaurants.about: Lucknowi Bawarchi serves authentic Lucknowi cuisine, showcasing the rich culinary heritage of Uttar Pradesh.

restaurants.name: Jaipur Spice
restaurants.about: Jaipur Spice brings the flavors of Rajasthan to life with its aromatic Rajasthani dishes and vibrant ambiance.

restaurants.name: Agra Palace
restaurants.offers: Buy 2 main courses, get 1 free appetizer
restaurants.about: Agra Palace offers a taste of Agra's royal Mughlai cuisine, known for its rich flavors and exquisite presentation.

restaurants.name: Mughlai Dastarkhwan
restaurants.about: Mughlai Dastarkhwan offers a regal dining experience with its exquisite Mughlai cuisine, known for its aromatic spices and richness.

restaurants.name: Rajasthani Rangoli
restaurants.about: Rajasthani Rangoli celebrates the flavors of Rajasthan with its traditional tandoori dishes and warm hospitality.

restaurants.name: Varanasi Vaishnavi
restaurants.about: Varanasi Vaishnavi specializes in authentic Varanasi cuisine, blending traditional flavors with a touch of modern flair.

restaurants.name: Patiala Junction
restaurants.about: Patiala Junction brings the robust flavors of Punjab to life with its authentic Punjabi dishes and vibrant ambiance.

restaurants.name: Kashmiri Khazana
restaurants.about: Kashmiri Khazana offers the flavors of Kashmiri cuisine, known for its rich use of spices and unique preparation methods.
